GOES Field of View¬∂

  • üåé ABI Geostationary field-of-view in Cartopy
    • Get the data‚Äôs coordinate reference system and field of view with the goes2go.tools.field_of_view function
  • ‚ö° GLM Geostationary field-of-view in Cartopy
    • Get the data‚Äôs coordinate reference system and field of view with the goes2go.tools.field_of_view function
    • You will notice that the GLM field of view is smaller than the ABI field of view, which can see the full disk.
    • What is the overlap from GOES West, as viewed from GOES East?
  • Why isn‚Äôt the GLM field of view circular? Why are there notches in the sides?
  • GLM Field of View Edges
    • How is this edge different than my estimated boundary in goes2go.tools.field_of_view?
  • GOES-East
  • GOES-West
